html:
2026-0006
2026-01-09ISEDFinancial Administration ActOrder directing the Business Development Bank of Canada and the Standards Council of Canada to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework Order directing the Business Development Bank of Canada and the Standards Council of Canada to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework in order to (1) align their policies, guidelines, and practices with the “Buy Canadian Procurement Policy Framework” and the policy instruments issued under section 6 of that framework, as amended from time to time, in a manner consistent with their respective mandate; and (2) report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.N/A
subject: Order directing the Business Development Bank of Canada and the Standards Council of Canada to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework
precis: Order directing the Business Development Bank of Canada and the Standards Council of Canada to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework in order to (1) align their policies, guidelines, and practices with the “Buy Canadian Procurement Policy Framework” and the policy instruments issued under section 6 of that framework, as amended from time to time, in a manner consistent with their respective mandate; and (2) report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.
